existing_features.title: Build a modern, clean, extra-long single-page portfolio website for “SolviroStudio” with a sticky top navigation menu containing: Home, Portfolio, About Us, Services, Client Results, Testimonials, Contact Us. Each menu item must scroll to its corresponding section via anchor links and highlight the active section while scrolling.

Implement the Home (Hero) section exactly with: headline “SolviroStudio – Meta Ads & Creative Designs That Solve Your Solar Business Challenges”, subheadline “We help solar companies attract leads, engage their audience, and maximize ROI with creative campaigns.”, a primary CTA button labeled “Get Started Now”, and a professional background gradient using #FFD233 → #FFA500 → #FF6A00.

Apply the brand accent colors #FFD233, #FFA500, #FF6A00 across the site for buttons, highlights, icons, and key accents, including a consistent gradient treatment (#FFD233 → #FFA500 → #FF6A00) for primary CTAs. Ensure buttons appear on every major section (Hero, About, Services, Portfolio, Client Results, Testimonials, Contact).
Create the “About SolviroStudio” section with the exact provided text and a “Learn More” CTA button, and include an optional image or team illustration adjacent to the text (responsive layout).

Create a “Services” section listing exactly three services with 1–2 sentence descriptions each: (1) Meta Ads Management for Solar Companies, (2) Creative Design & Visual Campaigns, (3) ROI-Focused Lead Generation. Include an “Explore Services” CTA button.

Create a “Portfolio” section showcasing 5–7 projects with visuals. Each project card/block must include: an ad design image, a campaign goal line (e.g., generate solar leads), and results achieved (leads, engagement, ROI metrics). Include a “View Full Portfolio” CTA button.

Create a dedicated “Client Results” section with the exact provided intro text and a responsive gallery/grid area for multiple result screenshots/graphics (charts/metrics). Include a “Get Your Results” CTA button.

Create a “Testimonials” section containing 3–5 client quotes praising Meta Ads and Creative Design services for solar businesses and include the exact provided supporting text. Include a CTA in this section consistent with the sitewide button pattern.

Create a “Contact Us” section with the exact provided text, display the email “solvirostudio@gmail.com”, show a phone placeholder, and include a simple contact form (name, email, optional phone, message) with a “Contact Me” submit button. On submit, validate required fields and show a clear success state.

Add brand/logo usage: incorporate the uploaded SolviroStudio logo image into the site header (and optionally the footer), ensuring it is responsive and visually consistent with the warm gradient brand theme.

Choose and apply one coherent, professional visual theme (typography, spacing, section separators, card styles) that complements the warm solar/energy brand colors and reinforces a trustworthy, results-focused feel. Use neutral background tones (e.g., off-white/charcoal/warm grays) to keep the orange/yellow accents readable and premium.

new_feature_requests.summary: Build SolviroStudio extra-long portfolio website with specified navigation sections, gradient brand colors, CTAs, services, portfolio projects, client results, testimonials, and contact form.
